04

Research Experience

Undergraduate Researcher at Illinois State University School of Information Technology | August 2025 - Present

Embedded Systems

Low Power Encryption Solutions for CubeSats

Benchmarked AES, ChaCha20, and other lightweight cryptographic ciphers on CubeSat-class microcontrollers to optimize energy consumption, latency, and memory usage for low-Earth-orbit satellite systems.

Machine Learning

Applied ML for Real-Time ASL Translation

Developing real-time translation pipeline from ASL gloss/video to English. Investigating dataset limitations and evaluating various translation architectures.

Selected participant in a nationally competitive applied cybersecurity research program sponsored by U.S. government and national laboratories.
